description: A list of email addresses that receive admin notices from memberships module on the site. Comma delimited.
name: membershiprecipients
label: Membersip admin notice recipients

description:
Default protection set on a member once they are approved. Members can be as public or private as you want. Changing this setting will only affect future members.
  • Public - Everyone can see this member
  • Private - Only administrators can see this member
  • All-members - All members can see this member
  • Member-type - Only members of that membership type can see this member
name: memberprotection
label: Member Protection

description:
Who is allowed to export members.
  • Public - Everyone can export members
  • Users - People logged-in can export members
  • Members - All members can export
  • Members of Same Type - Only members of that membership can export
  • Admin Only - Only administrators can export
name: memberexport
label: Member Export
